params.name: repo_id
params.description: The name of the repo on the Hub where your tool is defined.

params.name: token
params.description: The token to identify you on hf.co. If unset, will use the token generated when runninghuggingface-cli login (stored in ~/.huggingface).

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Additional keyword arguments that will be split in two: all arguments relevant to the Hub (such ascache_dir, revision, subfolder) will be used when downloading the files for your tool, and theothers will be passed along to its init.
